name: Tomb of Itzamna
description:
#Observer-Pattern

Play in browser or download available below (Download for best experience)

Adventure as Utah Smith, on the hunt for the treasure of Itzamna. After becoming stranded in Itzamna's tomb, Utah must solve the puzzles that will free him from the crypt.

CONTROLS
Movement - WASD/Arrow keys
Look - Mouse
Interact - E

After playing I would appreciate you taking a few minutes to complete a short feedback form, link https://forms.gle/jQKhW4Dd6mhXBDsk7

In this development build, some of the animations and music/SFX are currently non-operational. I am seeking feedback on the gameplay at this stage.

More updates to come as I continue working on this.

View the git repo here
https://github.com/Loz667/Delve-Deeper
